Articles.Content: All I'd like is some nose cones that have a customizable radius of explosion, if it hits something over its impact tolerance. Maybe it could also have a system where it will only explode if it's armed. I don't want bd armoury because I think it would be cooler to create an icbm from parts than strap bombs to a rocket or whatever.

This would actually work for BD Armoury because it has

1) ICBM flight AI

2) Explosives

3) Arm/Disarm feature

4) rescalable radius of explosion

The problem is with scaling the explosion fx, and radius in game.
